title: (PSX-PSP) Metal Gear Solid-VR Missions converted properly (Kingd
description:
METAL GEAR SOLID - VR MISSIONS:

Konami took the VR mission component of its successful Metal Gear Solid game and expanded on it with this standalone mission pack. As former Foxhound Special Forces operative Solid Snake, players engage in more than 300 virtual reality training missions and utilize their wits, stealth, and gadgets to get past the simulated foes. Most stages are more puzzle than action based, but Konami went even further and came up with detective movie-style murder cases that require the player&#039;s deductive reasoning to catch the killers.

Tested on Slim AND Fat and seem to work best with 3.40 POPS IMO... EnJoY.....KloWn
